name: default
description: Balanced prompts for both web2 and web3 leanings.

sections.label: Research Focus
prompts: What is the current gap I want to explore within this topic?
Who is already shipping in this area and what can I learn from their approach?
What metrics will signal that my exploration progressed?

sections.label: Signal Collection
prompts: List at least three authoritative sources (articles, videos, protocols) to bookmark.
Note one misconception or trap to avoid while collecting evidence.
What data fields or keywords do I need to harvest next?

sections.label: Next Moves
prompts: What quick experiment or prototype can I sketch today?
How will I document what worked and what failed?
What external voices should I cross-reference before moving forward?
